full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LAM GYI DKA' GNAS LA DOGS PA GCOD TSUL ZAB DON SNANG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @032A *, ,(CES LAM GYI DKA' GNAS LA DOGS PA GCOD TSUL ZAB DON SNANG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA BDAG PO CHEN PO'I RIGS KYI COD PAN DU BZHUGS SHING, THUB BSTAN YONGS RDZOGS KYI BDAG PO MDZAD PA RJE BTZUN LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE'I BKAS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MANG YUL SKYID GRONG GI RI KHROD BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG LAM BZANG 'DI NYID PHYOGS KUN TU 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
